title: NotATether
author: NotATether
content: Here's a pretty good diagram with counter-arguments you can use whenever someone throws a criticism of Bitcoin at you. It's a fairly old tweet, but still pretty useful.In general, @BoldBitcoin is a pretty good activist Bitcoiner, and you should follow their account even if you're not a fan of the service they're offering (which is incase you don't know a line of credit for your Bitcoin - that may give some of you BlockFi vibes but this is not the topic for discussing that).Enjoy! (source: https://twitter.com/BoldBitcoin/status/1655269202796634113?s=20)
